text: Milo Yiannopoulos is a British writer. He often criticizes feminism and Islam. He studied at the University of Manchester and Wolfson College. He has worked for The Telegraph. He covered the Gamergate controversy. In 2016 he was criticized for saying that sex between adults and children can sometimes be consensual.Rose, Katrina C. "Has the Future Already Been Forgotten: A Post-2007 Transgender Legal History Told through the Eyes of the Late,(Rarely) Great Employment Non-Discrimination Act." Wm. & Mary J. Women & L. 23 (2016): 527 == References == Category:English journalists Category:Writers from Kent Category:1984 births Category:Living people
title: Milo Yiannopoulos
